name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail to Tax Docs & Tax DMS

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: File your emails into Tax Docs & Tax DMS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Gmail Chrome Extension for TaxDMS.This extension helps users to select emails and file to DMS and also file documents from Google Drive to DMS.Users with access to DMS can use the extension to file the emails to the desired DMS Location.
